scripts.devctytb: cd dist && shopify theme dev --store szetad-81.myshopify.com
scripts.devctyfs: cd dist && shopify theme dev --store familystoregmc1.myshopify.com --ignore templates/*.json templates/metaobject/*.json templates/customers/*.json
scripts.deployfsdev: cd dist && shopify theme push --ignore config/settings_data.json templates/*.json templates/metaobject/*.json templates/customers/*.json -t 177302208798
scripts.deployfs: cd dist && shopify theme push --ignore config/settings_data.json templates/*.json templates/metaobject/*.json templates/customers/*.json -t 175098167582
scripts.deploytb: cd dist && shopify theme push --ignore config/settings_data.json templates/*.json templates/metaobject/*.json templates/customers/*.json
scripts.fetch: cd src && cd components && shopify theme pull --only templates/*.json
